      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Resolver
      Interface of a resolver.
      interface  TilePart
      Part of a tile declaration.
      Classes in enigma_edit.lua.data that implement Source 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConstValue
      A special SimpleValue of type integer, that holds a predefined constant.
      class  Expression
      An expression within the lua code, that is not interpreted by the CodeAnalyser.
      class  FieldReference
      This is a special Reference that points to a member of a table.
      class  LibmapMap 
      class  MMResolver
      Multi-mode resolver instances.
      class  MultiMode
      A multi-mode value, that has its own source.
      class  Nil
      A reference to the nil value.
      class  Reference
      This represents a reference to a Variable within the code.
      class  SimpleValue
      A simple value (directly representable by LuaValue).
      class  SourceData
      Base class for any data, that is defined by a piece of code.
      class  Table
      A lua table implemented as map between Strings and Variables.
      class  TileDecl
      A tile declaration.
      static class  TilePart.Construct
      Any part of a tile declaration (that is not a reference to another tile).
      static class  TilePart.Ref
      This is a special FieldReference, that stores a reference to a member of the Tiles-Resolver.
      class  Value
      Any source, that defines a value (as opposed to a reference).
      class  WoCallAPI20
      A call to the lua API function wo() creating the world.
